name: s3://eodata/CLMS/bio-geophysical/duration/clms_wsi_water-cover-duration_europe_utm_10m_yearly_v1
browserSearchPath: CLMS Bio-geophysical Parameters, Water Bodies, Duration
collectionDescription: The Water Cover Duration (WCD) product estimates the number of days land is covered by water. For each pixel and for a given hydrological year,  it indicates how frequently water is present. The hydrological year starts on 1 September. The product is generated at the European scale with a spatial resolution of 10 m Ã— 10 m. It is based on water masks derived from Sentinel-1 radar and Sentinel-2 optical data, combined with Water/Ice Cover data from Sentinel-2 (WIC S2). It is available for the period from 2016 to the present and can be downloaded in multiple projections and pixel spacings. More information here.

layers.shortDescription: Water presence frequency in a hydrological year (in days)
layers.longDescription: Water presence frequency in a hydrological year expressed in number of days (between 0 and 366). The dataset can also have the following values: cloud or cloud shadow (65485), sea water (65533), or no data (65535)

layers.shortDescription: Quality layer for the water cover duration (WCD) layer
layers.longDescription: Quality layer providing a basic assessment of the water cover duration layer.
